Задание - собери оптимальную колоду для игры Road to Valor, последней версии. Опиши преимущества каждой карты

При составлении оптимальной колоды для игры Road to Valor, стоит учесть различные факторы, такие как типы карт, стоимость маны, навыки и способности. Оптиимальная колода должна быть сбалансированной и иметь разнообразные стратегические возможности. 

Вот пример колоды с некоторыми преимуществами каждой карты:

1. Маг: 
Преимущество - Маг обладает мощными универсальными заклинаниями, которые могут атаковать нескольких противников одновременно или защищать своих союзников. Он также может контролировать положение на поле боя и наносить значительный урон.

2. Рыцарь: 
Преимущество - Рыцарь является прочным танком, который может выдержать большое количество урона и защищать слабых союзников. У него также имеются сильные атаки ближнего боя, что делает его универсальным бойцом.

3. Лучник: 
Преимущество - Лучник обладает высокой дальностью атаки и может наносить урон издалека. Он может атаковать противников на расстоянии, что позволяет ему избегать противостояний с более сильными противниками и контролировать положение на поле боя.

4. Шаман: 
Преимущество - Шаман способен выполнять различные роли, такие как лечение союзников или нанесение урона противникам. Он также может призывать духов и использовать свои навыки, чтобы заклинания действовали сильнее или продлевались.

5. Воин: 
Преимущество - Воин является мощным бойцом ближнего боя, который может наносить сильные удары и обладает высокой стойкостью. Он также может использовать различные умения, чтобы повысить свою выносливость или наносить массовый урон.

6. Убийца: 
Преимущество - Убийца способен быстро устранять слабых противников и проникать непосредственно в оборону врагов. У него есть высокие навыки уклонения и быстроты, что позволяет ему уклоняться от атак и атаковать противников в их слабые места.

7. Призрак:
Преимущество - Призрак обладает уникальной способностью проходить сквозь препятствия и незаметно подкрадываться к противнику. Он может наносить сильные атаки из засады и провокировать путаницу среди противников.

Помимо этих карт, в оптимальной колоде необходимо также учесть разнообразие заклинаний и поддержку союзников. Колода должна быть гармоничной, чтобы сочетать различные типы карт и стратегии игры.
Создай колоду для мобильной игры Road to valor. World War 2 для фракции Советский союз

Для создания колоды для фракции Советского Союза в игре Road to Valor: World War 2, необходимо учесть их историческую роль и особенности последней версии игры. Вот пример оптимальной колоды для этой фракции:

1. Гвардейский стрелок:
Преимущество - Гвардейские стрелки являются мощными бойцами с дальней дистанции. Они обладают высокой точностью и могут наносить значительный урон противникам издалека.

2. Комиссар:
Преимущество - Комиссары являются важными лидерами в колоде Советского Союза. Они могут повысить мораль и боевой дух союзников, а также оказывать пассивные бонусы для своих союзников.

3. Т-34 танк:
Преимущество - Т-34 является символом советской технической превосходности во время Второй мировой войны. Он обладает высокой прочностью и мощным оружием, что делает его отличным выбором для атаки и защиты.

4. Истребитель Як-9:
Преимущество - Истребители Як-9 являются надежными воздушными бойцами, способными уничтожать противников в небесной сфере. Они могут обеспечить защиту ваших союзников и нанести урон вражеским воздушным силам.

5. Красноармеец:
Преимущество - Красноармейцы являются основой советской армии. Они хорошо защищены и обладают сильной атакой в ближнем бою. Их численность позволяет использовать их для контроля положения на поле боя.

6. Зенитный орудиец:
Преимущество - Зенитные орудия являются эффективным средством против атак со стороны воздушной техники противника. Они могут наносить урон вражеским самолетам и обеспечивать защиту союзникам на земле.

7. Командир:
Преимущество - Командиры имеют способность повышать мораль и эффективность боевого духа союзников в широком радиусе. Они также могут использовать различные навыки, чтобы усилить атаку или защиту своей команды.

Колода должна быть гармоничной, с учетом различных типов карт и стратегий игры. Стремитесь к балансу между атакой и защитой, а также учтите возможности сотрудничества с другими игроками для максимальной эффективности в игре.

5. Катюша:
Преимущество - Катюша - это мобильный реактивный залповый огнемет, который способен нанести значительный урон большой площади. Она может быть эффективным оружием для ослабления скопления противников или разрушения оборонительных сооружений.

相应的数据我该去哪些网站搜寻呢

根据不同的数据需求，你可以尝试在以下网站进行搜索：

1. 百度 (www.baidu.com): 中国最受欢迎的搜索引擎，提供广泛的信息和数据搜索。
2. 谷歌 (www.google.com): 全球最受欢迎的搜索引擎，提供全面的搜索结果和各种类型的数据。
3. 维基百科 (www.wikipedia.org): 一个免费的多语种百科全书，适用于一般的概念和背景信息搜索。
4. Quora (www.quora.com): 一个知识问答社区，提供广泛领域的专业和个人经验回答。
5. Stack Exchange (stackexchange.com): 一个由社区驱动的问题和答案平台，覆盖了多个专业和学术领域。
6. Kaggle (www.kaggle.com): 一个数据科学和机器学习社区，提供各种类型的公开数据集和竞赛。
7. 数据政府网站：许多国家和地区的政府提供了公开数据和统计信息的网站，如data.gov (美国), data.gov.uk (英国)等。
8. 统计局网站：各国政府统计局或相关机构通常提供各种经济、人口和社会统计数据。例如，美国的美国经济分析局 (BEA) 和美国劳工统计局 (BLS)。
9. 学术研究机构和数据存储库：例如，World Bank Open Data、UNESCO Data、OECD Data 等提供了大量的国际经济和社会发展数据。

这只是一些常见的网站，你可以根据你的具体需求和背景进一步搜索适合的数据来源。

Title: The Barber Spy

Zohanele "Zohan" Dvir had left his days of counterterrorism behind, but trouble has a way of finding those who've dealt with it before. One day, while Zohan was busy chopping hair, he was kidnapped by the mafia and taken away to the depths of New Mexico. When he woke up, he realized he was in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by hostile gangsters.

Meanwhile, the infamous drug lord, Walter White, was looking for a way to expand his operation. His quest for more power led him to cross paths with the mafia, who had kidnapped Zohon. When Zohan's old colleagues in Israel found out about his disappearance, they sent in their most capable agent, Sikke Van Der Veer, aka Fietsopa, to help.

The new Mexico desert was not going to be easy terrain for the two spies. They had to move quickly and quietly, gathering as much intelligence as possible while avoiding detection by the mafia and Walter White's cronies. As they made their way closer to Zohan's location, they realized that there was much more at stake than just one man's life.

Walter White's drug operation was on the brink of exploding. He had a new chemical formula that could turn his meth into a product that was even more potent and lethal. If he succeeded, it could mean disaster for thousands of people. Zohan and Sikke needed to stop him at any cost.

In an epic showdown, the two spies battled their way through the tough terrain of the desert, facing off against Walter White's henchmen and the mafia's best gangsters. Zohan's counterterrorism skills came in handy as he expertly navigated the dangerous landscapes.

Finally, with the odds piled against them, Zohan and Sikke managed to infiltrate Walter White's lair. They sabotaged his equipment, destroyed his chemicals, and brought an end to his evil plan. But the mission came at a cost - one of them didn't make it out alive.

The Barber Spy was a tale of bravery, loyalty, and sacrifice. It showed that one never truly leaves their past life behind, and their skills can always come in handy when needed the most. Zohanele "Zohan" Dvir may have retired from being a counterterrorist, but he was still a hero when it counted.

Write lesson plan for teach grammar

Title: Introduction to Grammar

Grade Level: 6-8

Topic: The Basics of Grammar

Objective:
1. Students will understand the basics of grammar, including parts of speech such as nouns, verbs, adjectives, and adverbs.
2. Students will identify the different parts of speech in sentences and paragraphs.
3. Students will be able to apply their knowledge of grammar by constructing proper sentences.

Materials:
- Whiteboard and markers
- Printed worksheets with sentences for identification of parts of speech
- Handouts with grammar rules and examples
- Pencils and erasers

Introduction (5 minutes)
1. Begin the class by asking the students what grammar is and why it is important.
2. Explain the importance of grammar in communicating effectively, both in writing and speaking.
3. Have the students take a pre-lesson quiz to assess their current understanding of grammar.

Grammar Lesson (40 minutes)
1. Introduce the different parts of speech (nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs) and show examples of each.
2. Use the whiteboard to demonstrate how to identify each part of speech in a sentence.
3. Hand out worksheets for students to practice identifying the parts of speech in given sentences.
4. Go over the answers as a class, providing explanations for the correct answers.
5. Provide handouts with rules and examples for each part of speech to reinforce their understanding.

Practice and Application (20 minutes)
1. Allow students to work in pairs or groups to construct sentences using the different parts of speech.
2. Have students share their sentences with the class and identify the parts of speech used.
3. Provide feedback and assistance as necessary.

Conclusion (5 minutes)
1. Review the different parts of speech and their functions.
2. Ask students to share one key thing they learned about grammar today.
3. Collect the pre-lesson quizzes and provide feedback to students on their progress.

Assessment:
- Pre-lesson quiz to assess students' understanding of grammar before the lesson.
- Classwork and group work to assess the application of grammar rules and identification of parts of speech in sentences.
- Teacher observation and feedback during class activities.

write an essay about the phone as a favorite thing

As an artificial device, the phone has become a useful tool for everyone's daily life. It has now become an integral part of everyone's daily routine, from managing important business calls to keeping in touch with family and friends. The phone is one of the most used and reliable devices we have in this modern world.

The phone offers us various features that attract us and make it our favorite thing. With the availability of the internet, it provides fast and easy access to information and communication. With the help of social media apps like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and WhatsApp, we can connect with people living nearby or across the globe. In addition, we can search the internet for answers to our problems, and we can receive life-changing news and updates in real-time.

The camera features on our phones have changed the way we capture moments. Instead of carrying around a bulky camera, we now have the convenience of taking good quality pictures with our phones. The cameras on our phones have become so advanced that people can now take pictures professionally.

Furthermore, the portability of the phone means we can access work-related emails and documents while on the go. We can also use smartphones as navigation devices to get to unfamiliar locations.

Another significant thing to consider is that our mobile phones also serve as our personal digital assistant. They help us keep track of our daily schedule, send reminders to attend meetings or appointments, and even make phone calls on our behalf.

The evolution of the phone has also led to the development of countless third-party applications that add new features and functionality to the device. These apps include games, investment tools, fitness trackers, education apps, and content streaming services, where we can access music, videos, and TV shows.

In conclusion, we can see that the phone is a vital device that has become a favorite thing for many. The versatility, connectivity, and accessibility it provides make it an essential part of our daily routines. With the addition of new features and advancements, the phone remains a fundamental tool that continues to change the way we communicate, work, and stay informed at all times. The phone is a device that has become more than just technology for us; it is our lifeline, and we cannot imagine life without it.

The Rise and Fall of Squish:
Squish, a beloved animated series about a group of adorable and squishy characters, had gained a significant following among children. Tax Evasion as the Cause:

The Interim Replacement - Four Eyes!:
While the removal of Squish left a void in Boing’s programming, the channel quickly sought to fill it with a new show called Four Eyes!. Introduced as an interim replacement, Four Eyes! managed to captivate the audience with its unique storyline and quirky characters. Unfortunately, it also marked the end of Squish’s run on Boing.

Conclusion:
Squish’s sudden disappearance from Boing’s current programming schedule may have left fans disappointed, but the reasons behind it were rooted in Warner Bros Discovery’s tax evasion strategy. While Four Eyes! initially filled the gap, the remarkable success of KikoRiki cemented its place as the permanent replacement for Squish. Although unfortunate, the removal of Squish allowed Boing to continue providing quality animated content to its viewers and adapt to the challenging landscape of the television industry.
Write a follow up explaining Kung Fu Wa’s transition to Kix
Title: Kung Fu Wa’s Transition: From Boing to Kix

Introduction:
Television networks are known for constantly reshuffling their programming lineup to adapt to the ever-changing preferences of their viewers. One such program that underwent a significant transition was Kung Fu Wa, an animated series that originally aired on Boing. In this follow-up article, we explore the reasons behind Kung Fu Wa’s departure from Boing and its subsequent transition to the network Kix.

The Changing Landscape:
As the television industry becomes increasingly competitive, networks often make strategic decisions to enhance their brand identity and expand their reach. Boing, a popular channel known for its animated content, found itself needing to make adjustments to stay relevant in a rapidly evolving market. This led them to part ways with Kung Fu Wa, opening the door for a new program that would better fit their revised lineup.

Selling Kung Fu Wa to Kix:
In an effort to grow and gain recognition, Boing made the decision to sell the rights to Kung Fu Wa to the network Kix. While this move might have surprised fans of the show, it presented an opportunity for Kung Fu Wa to reach a potentially larger audience on a network specifically tailored to a particular demographic. Kix, known for its focus on action and adventure programming, seemed like a fitting new home for Kung Fu Wa.

The Need for Change:
The decision to let go of Kung Fu Wa was not an easy one for Boing, as the show had its own dedicated fan base. However, networks constantly evaluate their lineup, taking into consideration factors like viewership ratings, market trends, and the overall direction they want to go in terms of brand identity. In this case, Boing deemed that it was necessary to make changes, and Kung Fu Wa became a casualty of this adjustment.

Replacing Kung Fu Wa - Enter Code Lyoko:
As Kung Fu Wa made its exit from Boing, the network needed a suitable replacement to captivate viewers and align with their new programming strategy. Enter Code Lyoko, a critically acclaimed French animated series that seamlessly blended action, adventure, and science fiction. With its compelling storyline and unique animation style, Code Lyoko was chosen as an ideal replacement for Kung Fu Wa.

Future Prospects for Kung Fu Wa on Kix:
While Kung Fu Wa found a new home on Kix, the transition opened up possibilities for the show to gain a broader audience and thrive in its new environment. Kix’s focus on action-oriented programming meant that Kung Fu Wa would be amidst like-minded shows, giving it the opportunity to connect with viewers who have a specific interest in martial arts and animated action series.

Conclusion:
The transition of Kung Fu Wa from Boing to Kix was a strategic move made by both networks to cater to changing viewer preferences and expand their reach. While Boing relinquished the series to make room for new programming, Kix provided Kung Fu Wa with an environment that better aligned with its action-oriented content. As Kung Fu Wa settles into its new home, it will be exciting to see how it fares on Kix and if it manages to find a new and enthusiastic fan base. Минусы:

5. Возврат товаров - возможность возвращать товары от клиентов, если они не подошли или имеют дефекты.
6. Назначение товаров услуге - возможность автоматического назначения товаров для конкретных услуг в салоне оптики. Например, посетитель выбрал определенное очковое стекло из каталога, программная система автоматически резервирует его на эту услугу.
7. Определение необходимого товара - возможность определения необходимого количества товаров на складе с помощью отчетов о запасах, данных о продажах и поставках, позволяющих принимать более точные решения по запасам через систему дополнительных оповещений и автоматизированных заказов.
исходя из описания деятельности салона оптики выдели бизнес процесс которые нужно автоматезировать

Исходя из описания деятельности салона оптики, основные бизнес-процессы, которые можно автоматизировать, включают:
1. Учет движения товаров – включая добавление новых товаров, учет складских остатков, перемещение товаров, списание товаров и определение необходимого количества товаров на складе.
2. Учет продаж – включая оформление заказов, продажу товаров, возврат товаров, подбор товара для определенных услуг (например, индивидуальный подбор очкового стекла под клиента).
3. Учет кассовых операций – включая работу с наличными, банковскими картами, электронными деньгами и чеками оплаты товаров.
4. Учет работы персонала – включая назначение задач и контроль выполнения задач.
5. Учет и анализ данных о клиентах – включая учет истории заказов и покупок клиентов, их контактной информации, лояльности и скидок.
6. Учет услуг – включая подбор и продажу услуг, учет диагностики и ремонта, гарантии товаров и т.д.
7. Учет финансов – включая составление отчетов о доходах и расходах, налоговой отчетности, работы с поставщиками.
8. Управление складом – включая автоматический расчет размера заказов, контроль складских остатков, работу со своими и поставщиками с целью оптимизации движения товаров.

Автоматизация этих бизнес-процессов может значительно упростить и ускорить деятельность салона оптики, облегчить контроль за складскими остатками и финансовыми операциями, дающую возможность более эффективного использования времени сотрудников и обеспечить высококачественное обслуживание клиентов.
расскажи какие основные процессы можно добавить в диаграмму декомпозиции

Процесс декомпозиции - это разделение общего процесса на набор более мелких подпроцессов, что облегчает их управление и проектирование более эффективных бизнес-процессов. В контексте салона оптики, некоторые основные процессы, которые могут быть добавлены в диаграмму декомпозиции, могут включать:

1. Процесс обслуживания клиентов - включая успешную продажу товаров или услуг и удовлетворение потребностей клиент

финансовая деятельность ПАОсбербанк

ПАО Сбербанк является крупнейшим банком России и одним из крупнейших финансовых институтов в мире. Он осуществляет широкий спектр финансовых услуг для корпоративных и частных клиентов.

Основные виды финансовой деятельности ПАО Сбербанк включают:

1. Розничное и корпоративное кредитование: Сбербанк предоставляет различные виды кредитования, включая ипотечное кредитование, потребительские и автокредиты, корпоративные кредиты, облигации и синдицированные займы.

2. Депозиты: Сбербанк принимает депозиты от населения и организаций в различных валютах и на различных условиях. Это включает постоянные и срочные вклады, а также банковские счета с различными условиями и ставками.

3. Инвестиционный банкинг: Сбербанк предоставляет услуги по размещению акций и облигаций и осуществляет поддержку их обращения на финансовых рынках. Банк также консультирует корпоративных клиентов по сделкам слияний и поглощений и структурированию долговых портфелей.

4. Брокерские услуги и управление активами: Сбербанк предоставляет возможность индивидуальным и корпоративным клиентам инвестировать в различные финансовые инструменты, такие как акции, облигации, инвестиционные фонды, а также предоставляет услуги по доверительному управлению и управлению корпоративными пенсионными программами.

5. Рынок платежных решений и электронная коммерция: Сбербанк предоставляет широкий спектр банковских услуг, связанных с обработкой и проведением платежей и денежных переводов, как для частных лиц, так и для юридических лиц, а также предоставляет услуги электронной коммерции через свои онлайн-платформы.

6. Инновации и технологии: Сбербанк активно инвестирует в инновационные проекты и разработку новых технологий на финансовом рынке, включая разработку нейронных сетей, искусственного интеллекта, кибербезопасности и блокчейн-технологий.

7. Страхование: Сбербанк осуществляет свою собственную страховую деятельность через дочерние компании, предоставляя корпоративным и частным клиентам услуги по страхованию различных видов рисков.

В целом, финансовая деятельность ПАО Сбербанк связана с обслуживанием потребностей клиентов в различных направлениях: кредитование и депозиты, инвестиционный банкинг, управление активами, платежная инфраструктура, страхование и разработка инновационных финансовых продуктов и технологий.

содержание темы: оценка показателей эффективности

Тема "Оценка показателей эффективности" обычно охватывает различные методы и инструменты, используемые для определения уровня успеха и результативности организации или отдельного проекта. В рамках этой темы могут рассматриваться следующие аспекты:

1. Определение показателей эффективности (KPI): Выбор ключевых показателей производительности, котоые отражают качество и результаты работы организации или проекта, и являются основой для оценки эффективности.

2. Финансовые показатели: Рассмотрение таких показателей, как оборачиваемость активов, рентабельность продаж, валовая прибыль, чистая прибыль и множество других показателей, которые характеризуют финансовый успех организации.

3. Операционные показатели: Определение критериев, связанных с эффективностью работы процессов и систем, таких как сокращение времени на выполнение задач, уменьшение доли дефектной продукции и оптимизация расходов на производство.

4. Управленческие показатели: Оценка эффективности принимаемых решений, уровень делегирования и инициативы сотрудников, качество внутренних процессов, коммуникаций и корпоративной культуры.

5. Качественные показатели: Оценка уровня удовлетворенности клиентов, повторных продаж, репутации бренда и уровня инновационной активности организации.

6. Развитие персонала: Изучение показателей, отражающих эффективность работы с персоналом, таких как уровень обучения, профессионального роста, трудовой мотивации и удовлетворенности сотрудников.

7. Анализ и сравнение: Сравнение показателей вашей организации с аналогичными показателями конкурентов или отраслевыми стандартами. Это позволит определить, насколько эффективна ваша организация по сравнению с другими компаниями в вашей сфере деятельности.

8. Установление целей и корректировка стратегии: Основываясь на анализе показателей эффективности, выявление областей, требующих улучшения, и определение новых целей для повышения эффективности и достижения долгосрочного роста и развития организации.

Оценка показателей эффективности является важным инструментом для анализа текущей ситуации в организации и планирования дальнейших стратегических действий, направленных на улучшение результатов и повышение конкурентоспособности.
Заключение и выводы курсовой работы по теме: финансовое планирование

Заключение

В ходе курсовой работы были изучены основные аспекты и методы финансового планирования. Финансовое планирование играет существенную роль в обеспечении стабильности, роста и развития организаций различных видов деятельности и размеров. Оно позволяет планировать, контролировать и оптимизировать распределение финансовых ресурсов, снижать риски и создавать основу для успешной реализации стратегических задач и корпоративных целей.

Выводы

1. Финансовое планирование – это важный механизм управления финансами предприятия, направленный на обеспечение устойчивого и эффективного использования ресурсов, а также более точное и своевременное выполнение финансовых обязательств.

2. Основными этапами финансового планирования являются: прогнозирование и анализ финансовой ситуации, определение финансовых целей и задач, разработка стратегических и оперативных финансовых планов, контроль и корректировка планов в соответствии с изменяющимися условиями внешней и внутренней среды.

3. Финансовое планирование должно осуществляться на трех основных уровнях: стратегическом, тактическом и оперативном. На каждом уровне финансовые планы разрабатываются с учетом конкретных задач и сроков, а также системы показателей для контроля и оценки достижения поставленных целей.

4. В центре процесса финансового планирования находится бюджетирование, которое представляет собой разработку и согласование ряда связанных между собой бюджетов, отражающих планы и прогнозы на различные направления деятельности организации.

5. Эффективное бюджетирование и финансовое планирование позволяют предприятию прогнозировать доходы и издержки, определить наиболее рациональное распределение ресурсов, выявить и устранять трудности, связанные с использованием финансовых ресурсов, и повышать общую эффективность управления предприятием.

6. Функционирование системы финансового планирования требует постоянного контроля, анализа данных и корректировки планов в соответствии с изменениями нормативно-правовой базы, состоянием экономики, требованиями рынка и внутренней ситуацией на предприятии. 

На основе проведенного исследования можно сделать вывод о том, что финансовое планирование является значимым и неотъемлемым элементом управления финансами предприятий и организаций. Разработка, реализация и контроль финансовых планов способствуют оптимизации использования ресурсов, снижению рисков и обеспечению долгосрочной устойчивости и роста компании на конкурентном рынке.

환생 전, 마이클 신이었던 시절.

그의 드리블 능력은 세계 최고 수준이었다.

전 세계적으로도 손꼽힐 정도로 높은 돌파 성공률을 보유한 선수였기에 매번 상대 수비수를 부숴버리는 크랙으로서의 역할까지 소화했다.

‘발재간이 워낙 좋아서 윙어로 나가도 잘했었지.’

더구나 스피드도 매우 빨랐다.

그보다 발이 빠른 선수는 전 세계를 놓고 봐도 찾기 힘들 정도였다.



‘빠르긴 빨랐지. 육상 전문가들이 나보고 육상을 했어도 메달리스트가 됐을 거라고 했으니까.’



그러나 환생을 한 지금은 그토록 빨랐던 스피드를 내지 못한다.

스피드만으로 수비수를 농락해버리던 플레이 역시 하지 못한다.

다만, 과거의 드리블 능력만큼은 많이 되찾은 상태였다.

그것만으로도 아틀레티코 마드리드의 수비진을 뚫어내기엔 충분했다.

신재욱은 그렇게 확신했다.



“충분히 할 수 있어.”



아틀레티코 마드리드의 공격을 끊어내며 만들어진 역습상황.

상대는 현시점에서 세계 최고의 수비력을 지녔다고 평가받는 팀이었지만.

신재욱의 전진엔 망설임이 없었다.



투욱! 툭!



공을 앞으로 시원하게 치며 속도를 높였다.

겉으론 시원시원해 보이지만, 그만큼 빈틈이 드러나는 드리블이었다.

당연하게도 아틀레티코 마드리드의 수비수들에겐 그 빈틈이 보였다.



“끊어!”

“쟤 드리블 길다! 잘라내!”

“바로 막아버려!”



아틀레티코 마드리드 선수들의 고함이 터졌고.

신재욱과 가장 가까운 곳에서 달리던 주앙 미란다가 덤벼들었다.

주앙 미란다는 좋은 머리를 이용한 영리한 수비를 펼치는 선수다.

그 능력이 워낙 대단해서 팀 동료인 디에고 고딘과 함께 아틀레티코 마드리드의 주전 수비수로 뛰는 선수다.

그런데 지금은 그답지 않은 모습을 보였다.

대놓고 보이는 신재욱의 빈틈을 노리는 걸 참지 못한 것이다.



― 주앙 미란다가 신재욱 선수에게 덤벼들고 있습니다!



발을 뻗는 주앙 미란다의 움직임은 날카로웠다.

그러나 문제는 신재욱이 예상했다는 것이다.



‘태클이 너무 급했어. 이런 태클엔 안 당하지.’



신재욱은 주앙 미란다가 발을 뻗는 타이밍에 맞춰서 반대편으로 공을 툭― 밀었다.

동시에 공을 밀어낸 방향으로 움직였다.



― 우워! 신재욱이 간결한 드리블로 주앙 미란다를 제쳐냈습니다!

― 아틀레티코 마드리드! 위기입니다! 주앙 미란다 선수의 태클이 너무 성급했죠!



역습을 허용하게 된 상황에서 수비수 하나가 제쳐졌기에, 아틀레티코 마드리드의 수비엔 큰 틈이 생길 수밖에 없었다.

신재욱은 그 틈을 철저하게 파고들었다.



― 신재욱 선수의 드리블 방향 선택이 너무 좋네요! 이 선수, 너무나도 지능적입니다!

― 마치 경기장 위에서 밑을 내려다보고 있는 것처럼 상대의 빈틈을 파고들고 있습니다! 신재욱 선수는 대체 시야가 얼마나 넓은 걸까요?



완벽한 판단으로 상대의 빈틈으로만 파고드는 움직임.

보는 이로 하여금 답답함이 전혀 생기지 않는, 시원한 움직임이었다.

물론 막아야 하는 수비수들에겐 끔찍한 움직임이었지만.



휘익! 툭!



신재욱이 주앙 미란다로 인해서 생긴 공간으로 침투하자, 아틀레티코 마드리드의 골키퍼 쿠르투아가 골대를 비우고 달려 나왔다.

공격수의 공을 뺏을 수 있으면 좋고, 그러지 못하더라도 슈팅 각도를 줄일 수 있는 행동이었다.

그러나 이 행동엔 큰 약점이 있었다.

칩슛에 매우 약하다는 것.



― 고오오오오오오오올! 신재욱 선수의 골입니다! 챔피언스리그 결승전에서도 자신의 능력을 제대로 보여주고 있습니다!

― 너무나도 침착한 마무리였습니다! 쿠르투아 골키퍼가 나오는 걸 보고 정확한 칩슛을 때려버리네요! 이게 바로 스트라이커죠!

― 모든 판단이 완벽했습니다! 드리블과 슈팅도 환상적이었고요! 이번 경기가 끝나면 신재욱 선수의 명성이 더욱 높아지겠는데요?

― 지금도 많은 팀에게 러브콜을 받는 것으로 알고 있거든요? 하하! 이러면 신재욱 선수의 에이전트는 일이 많아질 수밖에 없겠습니다.

― 바이에른 뮌헨 측에서도 불안하겠는데요? 신재욱 선수를 지키고 싶은데, 잘해도 너무 잘하니까요!



신재욱은 칩슛을 자유자재로 구사할 수 있는 선수였고, 어렵지 않게 쿠르투아의 키를 넘긴 슈팅을 해내며 골을 넣었다.



‘해냈네. 주앙 미란다가 급하게 덤벼줘서 생각보다 어렵지 않았어.’



만족스러운 골이었다.

현재의 몸 상태에서 할 수 있는 최고의 움직임에 가까웠으니까.



‘이제 굳이 서두르지 말자.’



골을 넣었지만, 신재욱은 평소처럼 공을 향해 달려가지 않았다.

달려드는 동료들을 향해 양팔을 뻗으며 크게 소리쳤다.



“이제 3 대 0입니다!”

3 대 0 스코어.

전반전은 그렇게 끝이 났다.

바이에른 뮌헨이 수비에 중심을 둔 운영을 펼치며 아틀레티코 마드리드의 공격을 잘 막아낸 결과였다.



― 후반전이 시작됩니다! 과연 아틀레티코 마드리드가 불리해진 상황을 반전시킬 수 있을까요?



후반전이 시작된 이후, 아틀레티코 마드리드는 더욱 공격에 힘을 실었다.

이들도 챔피언스리그 우승을 노리고 있는 팀이기에 어쩔 수 없는 선택이었다.

그러나 마음이 급하다고 잘 통하지 않던 공격이 통하긴 어려웠다.

자연스레 아틀레티코 마드리드의 공격진은 답답함을 드러냈다.



― 디에고 코스타가 공을 뺏기고 짜증을 내고 있습니다! 이 선수, 멘탈이 좋지 않은 선수거든요? 게다가 이미 카드가 한 장 있는 상태이기 때문에, 특히나 조심해야 합니다.



― 다비드 비야가 돌파를 시도했지만 실패했습니다. 방금은 무리한 돌파였죠? 바이에른 뮌헨의 수비진은 오늘 높은 집중력을 보여주고 있기에 이런 돌파 시도에는 안 당하죠!



― 아르다 투란 선수의 드리블이 막혔습니다! 이 선수는 드리블이 굉장히 좋은 선수인데, 아무리 그래도 필립 람 선수와 하피냐 선수 두 명이 달라붙으면 뚫어내기 어렵죠!



아틀레티코 마드리드의 공격은 번번이 막혔다.

시간은 흘렀고, 아틀레티코 마드리드의 집중력은 떨어졌다.

후반 30분이 지난 이후엔 오히려 바이에른 뮌헨이 좋은 기회를 만들었다.



‘분위기가 많이 넘어왔어. 이럴 땐 굳이 시간을 끌기보단 하나 더 만들어보는 것도 괜찮지.’



공을 잡은 신재욱이 옅게 미소 지었다.

이전까지는 안정적으로 후방에 있는 동료에게 패스했지만, 지금은 그럴 생각이 없었다.

지금만큼은 상대가 드러낸 빈틈을 무시하고 싶지 않았다.



퍼엉!



신재욱이 측면 깊숙한 곳으로 패스를 뿌렸다.

공을 적당한 힘으로 띄워서 보내는 정교한 패스였다.

받는 게 쉬운, 좋은 패스였기에 측면으로 들어가던 프랑크 리베리는 어렵지 않게 공을 잡아냈다.



― 신재욱 선수가 프랑크 리베리 선수에게 연결합니다!



프랑크 리베리는 많은 경험이 있는 월드클래스 윙어였고, 대부분 경기에서 좋은 모습을 보여주는 선수였다.

명실상부 바이에른 뮌헨의 레전드 중 하나.

오늘도 준수한 활약을 펼치던 프랑크 리베리는 지금도 아틀레티코 마드리드의 측면 수비수를 뚫어냈다.



― 프랑크 리베리! 아틀레티코 마드리드의 페널티박스 안으로 침투합니다! 좋은 움직임입니다!



프랑크 리베리의 움직임은 과감했다.

동작 하나하나에 자신감이 묻어나왔다.



― 어어? 직접 하나요? 프랑크 리베리! 해결 능력이 있는 선수거든요?



아틀레티코 마드리드의 수비수들은 프랑크 리베리에게만 신경 쓸 수가 없는 상황이었다.

이택현과 토마스 뮐러가 페널티박스 안에서 위협적으로 움직이고 있었으니까.

게다가 신재욱까지 페널티박스 근처에 도착한 상황이었으니까.



― 프랑크 리베리! 때립니다!



결국, 아틀레티코 마드리드의 수비수들은 프랑크 리베리의 슈팅을 방해하지 못했다.

그것에 대한 대가는 컸다.



― 들어갔습니다! 프랑크 리베리! 골입니다! 직접 슈팅을 때려서 골을 넣네요!

― 역시 클래스가 있는 선수답습니다! 프랑크 리베리가 아틀레티코 마드리드에게 쐐기를 박아버립니다!



4 대 0.

전 세계 축구팬들을 충격에 빠뜨릴만한 일방적인 스코어였다.

더구나 이 경기가 챔피언스리그 결승전이라는 걸 생각하면 더욱 충격적이었다.



└ 바이에른 뮌헨이 완전히 압도하네! 이럴 거라고는 예상하지 못했는데…….

└ 신재욱 2골, 이택현 1골, 프랑크 리베리 1골…… 바이에른 뮌헨의 화력이 세계 최고였어. 세계 최고의 방패라는 아틀레티코 마드리드가 부서졌잖아.

└ 충격적이야. 아틀레티코 마드리드가 이렇게 당할 줄은 몰랐는데.

└ 난 신재욱의 실력에 놀랐어. 얘가 이렇게 잘하는 선수였구나? 분데스리가에서 두 시즌 연속 득점왕이라길래 잘하는 줄은 알았는데, 이 정도면 현역 스트라이커 중 최고 아니야? EPL이나 라리가에 얘보다 잘하는 스트라이커가 있어? 난 못 찾겠는데?

└ 루이스 수아레스가 있잖아.

└ 리버풀의 루이스 수아레스? 얘도 이번 2013/14시즌만큼은 괴물이었지. 근데 난 루이스 수아레스가 신재욱보다 더 뛰어난 스트라이커라는 말엔 동의 못 하겠어. 물론 검증이 필요하겠지만, 난 신재욱이 EPL에 오면 루이스 수아레스보다 더 잘할 거라고 믿어.

└ 이번 시즌의 루이스 수아레스와 비교되는 것만으로도 신재욱은 세계 최고의 스트라이커 중 하나야.

└ 난 이택현한테 충격받았어. 얘, 레알 마드리드나 바이에른 뮌헨에서도 주전으로 뛸 수 있겠는데? 빠른데다가 기본기도 좋고, 축구 지능도 높더라.

└ 필립 람과 슈바인슈타이거도 높은 클래스를 제대로 보여줬어. 그리고 프랑크 리베리는 역시나 프랑크 리베리다웠고.

└ 이 경기를 보고 있는 축구팬들이라면 다 같은 생각일 거야. 리오넬 메시와 크리스티아누 호날두에 이어서 신계에 오를 선수는 신재욱이야.



전 세계 축구팬들의 반응은 비슷했다.

바이에른 뮌헨의 경기력에 놀랐고, 신재욱의 실력에 충격받았다는 반응이 대부분이었다.

그리고 많은 수의 축구팬들이 주장했다.

신재욱은 신계에 오를 선수라고.

크리스티아누 호날두와 리오넬 메시의 뒤를 이을 선수라고.



― 이제 시간이 얼마 남지 않았습니다! 양 팀 선수들이 조금만 더 힘을 내줬으면 좋겠습니다!



경기 종료가 가까워질수록 양 팀 선수들의 움직임이 느려졌다.

체력이 바닥나버린 것이다.

그런데 유일하게 멀쩡히 뛰는 선수가 있었다.

놀랍게도 그 선수는 체력적으로 지쳐야 할 시간에 오히려 더 컨디션이 좋아 보였다.



[극도의 정신력]

[등급] S

[효과] 체력이 완전히 바닥났을 때, 극도의 정신력을 발휘하며 많은 시간 더 뛸 수 있게 됩니다. 특성의 효과가 발휘될 때, 컨디션이 매우 좋아집니다.



성장한 특성의 효과를 받은 신재욱.

그가 날뛰기 시작했다.

추가시간을 다 합쳐도 경기 종료까지 10분 정도밖에 안 남은 상황이었지만.



“10분이면 충분하지.”



신재욱이 무언가를 만들어내기엔 차고 넘치는 시간이었다.



― 신재욱 선수가 굉장히 활발하게 움직이고 있습니다! 이건…… 놀라운데요? 지금까지 힘을 아껴뒀던 걸까요……?

― 말이 안 됩니다! 신재욱 선수는 전반전과 후반전 내내 많이 뛰었거든요?



전 세계가 지켜보는 챔피언스리그 결승전.

그 무대에 선 신재욱이 전 세계 축구팬들을 강렬한 충격에 빠뜨리기 시작했다.

182

---

Before his reincarnation, during the days when he was Michael Shin.

His dribbling ability was among the best in the world.

He was a player with one of the highest successful dribble rates globally, often breaking through the opposition's defense, fulfilling the role of a crack player.

'I was so good with the ball at my feet that I played well as a winger too.'

Moreover, his speed was incredibly fast.

It was hard to find a player faster than him anywhere in the world.

'I was fast. Track and field experts said I could have been a medalist if I had pursued athletics.'

However, now that he has reincarnated, he can no longer unleash that same speed.

He can no longer play the game of mocking defenders with just his speed.

However, he had regained much of his past dribbling ability.

That alone was enough to break through Atletico Madrid's defense.

Shin Jaewook was confident of that.

"I can definitely do it."

During a counterattack created by cutting off Atletico Madrid's offense.

The opponent was a team considered to have the best defense in the world at the time.

But there was no hesitation in Shin Jaewook's advance.

Thwack! Tap!

He kicked the ball forward briskly, increasing his speed.

It looked refreshing from the outside, but such dribbling also exposed vulnerabilities.

Naturally, Atletico Madrid's defenders saw these openings.

"Cut him off!"

"His dribble is long! Intercept it!"

"Block him right away!"

The shouts of Atletico Madrid's players erupted.

Joao Miranda, who was running closest to Shin Jaewook, charged at him.

Joao Miranda was a player known for his intelligent defense using his good head.

His ability was so great that he played as a starting defender for Atletico Madrid alongside his teammate Diego Godin.

But now, he showed an uncharacteristic eagerness.

He couldn't resist going for the obvious gap in Shin Jaewook's defense.

— Joao Miranda is charging at player Shin Jaewook!

Joao Miranda's movement to extend his leg was sharp.

However, the problem was that Shin Jaewook had anticipated it.

'The tackle was too hasty. I won't fall for such a tackle.'

Shin Jaewook pushed the ball to the opposite side just as Joao Miranda stretched out his leg.

At the same time, he moved in the direction he had pushed the ball.

— Wow! Shin Jaewook has bypassed Joao Miranda with a neat dribble!

— Atletico Madrid is in crisis! Joao Miranda's tackle was too hasty!

With a defender bypassed in a situation that allowed a counterattack, a significant gap opened in Atletico Madrid's defense.

Shin Jaewook thoroughly exploited that gap.

— The choice of direction for Shin Jaewook's dribble is excellent! This player is so intelligent!

— It's as if he's looking down from above on the field, finding the opponent's weaknesses! How wide is Shin Jaewook's field of vision?

His movement, penetrating only through the opponent's weaknesses with perfect judgment, was refreshing to watch and didn't cause any frustration for the viewers.

Of course, for the defenders who had to block him, it was a dreadful movement.

Swoosh! Tap!

As Shin Jaewook penetrated the space created by Joao Miranda, Atletico Madrid's goalkeeper Courtois left his goal and rushed out.

It was an action to try to steal the ball from the attacker or, at the very least, reduce the shooting angle.

However, this action had a significant weakness.

It was very vulnerable to chip shots.

— Goooooal! It's a goal by Shin Jaewook! He's showing his abilities even in the Champions League final!

— Such a calm finish! He saw Courtois coming out and executed a precise chip shot! That's a true striker!

— Every decision was perfect! The dribbling and shooting were fantastic! After this match, Shin Jaewook's reputation will rise even higher, won't it?

— He's already receiving love calls from many teams, right? Ha ha! If this continues, Shin Jaewook's agent will have a lot of work to do.

— Bayern Munich must be feeling anxious, right? They want to keep Shin Jaewook, but he's playing too well!

Shin Jaewook was a player who could freely execute chip shots, and he easily scored a goal by shooting over Courtois's height.

'I did it. Thanks to <PRESIDIO_ANONYMIZED_PERSON> rushing in hastily, it was easier than I thought.'

It was a satisfying goal.

It was close to the best movement he could make with his current physical condition.

'Let's not rush anymore.'

Even though he scored, Shin Jaewook didn't run towards the ball as usual.

He stretched out his arms towards his approaching teammates and shouted loudly.

"Now it's 3 to 0!"

---

3 to 0 score.

The first half ended like that.

Bayern Munich focused on defense and successfully blocked Atletico Madrid's attacks.

— The second half begins! Can Atletico Madrid turn around the situation they're in?

In the second half, Atletico Madrid put more power into their offense.

They were a team aiming for the Champions League title, so it was an inevitable choice.

However, attacks that didn't work well when they were hasty didn't suddenly start working.

Naturally, Atletico Madrid's attackers showed their frustration.

— Diego Costa has lost the ball and is showing his frustration! This player is known for not having the best mentality, and he already has a yellow card, so he needs to be especially careful.

— David Villa attempted a breakthrough but failed. That was a forced attempt, wasn't it? Bayern Munich's defense is showing high concentration today, so they won't fall for such attempts!

— Arda Turan's dribble has been stopped! This player is known for his excellent dribbling, but even so, it's hard to break through when Philipp Lahm and Rafinha, two players, are sticking to him!

Atletico Madrid's attacks were repeatedly blocked.

Time passed, and Atletico Madrid's concentration waned.

After 30 minutes into the second half, Bayern Munich created good opportunities instead.

'The atmosphere has shifted a lot. In such times, it's not bad to try to score one more rather than just killing time.'

Shin Jaewook smiled faintly as he got the ball.

Until now, he had been passing the ball stably to his teammates in the back, but now he didn't want to do that.

He didn't want to ignore the vulnerabilities the opponent had exposed.

Boom!

Shin Jaewook sent a pass deep into the flank.

It was a precise pass that floated the ball with just the right amount of power.

Since it was a good pass that was easy to receive, Franck Ribery, who was moving to the flank, easily caught the ball.

— Shin Jaewook connects with Franck Ribery!

Franck Ribery was a world-class winger with a lot of experience and a player who showed good performance in most matches.

He was one of the undisputed legends of Bayern Munich.

Today, as on other days, Franck Ribery broke through Atletico Madrid's flank defense.

— Franck Ribery! He's penetrating into Atletico Madrid's penalty box! Good movement!

Franck Ribery's movement was bold.

Confidence oozed from every action.

— What? Is he going for it himself? Franck Ribery! He's a player with the ability to finish!

Atletico Madrid's defenders couldn't focus only on Franck Ribery.

Lee Taekhyun and Thomas Muller were moving threateningly inside the penalty box.

And Shin Jaewook had also arrived near the penalty box.

— Franck Ribery! He shoots!

In the end, Atletico Madrid's defenders couldn't interfere with Franck Ribery's shot.

The price for that was high.

— It's in! Franck Ribery! Goal! He shoots directly and scores!

— As expected of a player with class! Franck Ribery seals the deal for Atletico Madrid!

4 to 0.

It was a one-sided score that shocked football fans around the world.

Especially considering that this match was the Champions League final, it was even more shocking.

└ Bayern Munich is completely dominating! I didn't expect this...

└ Shin Jaewook 2 goals, Lee Taekhyun 1 goal, Franck Ribery 1 goal... Bayern Munich's firepower was the best in the world. The world's best shield, Atletico Madrid, has been shattered.

└ It's shocking. I didn't expect Atletico Madrid to be beaten like this.

└ I'm amazed by Shin Jaewook's skills. So he was this good? I knew he was good because he was the top scorer in the Bundesliga for two consecutive seasons, but isn't he the best active striker? Is there a striker in the EPL or La Liga better than him? I can't find one.

└ There's Luis Suarez.

└ Liverpool's Luis Suarez? He was a monster this 2013/14 season too. But I can't agree that Luis Suarez is a better striker than Shin Jaewook. Of course, it needs verification, but I believe Shin Jaewook would do better than Luis Suarez if he went to the EPL.

└ Just being compared to this season's Luis Suarez makes Shin Jaewook one of the world's best strikers.

└ I was shocked by Lee Taekhyun. This guy could be a starter for Real Madrid or Bayern Munich, right? He's fast, has good fundamentals, and high football intelligence.

└ Philipp Lahm and Schweinsteiger also showed their high class properly. And Franck Ribery was, as always, Franck Ribery.

└ If you're a football fan watching this game, you'll all have the same thought. After Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo, the next player to ascend to the pantheon will be Shin Jaewook.

The reaction of football fans around the world was similar.

They were amazed by Bayern Munich's performance and shocked by Shin Jaewook's skills.

And many football fans claimed that Shin Jaewook was a player who would ascend to the pantheon.

He would be the one to follow in the footsteps of Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi.

— There's not much time left now! I hope the players from both teams can give a little more strength!

As the end of the match approached, the movements of the players from both teams slowed down.

They had run out of stamina.

However, there was one player who was still running energetically.

Surprisingly, this player seemed to be in better condition at a time when he should have been physically exhausted.

[Extreme Mental Strength]

[Grade] S

[Effect] When stamina is completely depleted, extreme mental strength is exerted, allowing you to run for much longer. When the trait's effect is activated, your condition improves significantly.

Shin Jaewook, who had received the effects of the grown trait, began to rampage.

Even though there were only about 10 minutes left until the end of the match, including added time.

"10 minutes is more than enough."

It was more than enough time for Shin Jaewook to create something.

— Shin Jaewook is moving very actively! This is... surprising? Did he save his energy until now...?

— It doesn't make sense! Shin Jaewook has been running a lot throughout the first and second halves?

In the Champions League final, watched by the whole world, Shin Jaewook began to shock football fans with his intense performance.

신재욱의 선제골로 1 대 0 스코어가 된 이후.

러시아 선수들의 머릿속엔 빨리 만회 골을 넣겠다는 마음이 가득했다.

이들은 오늘 한국에게 질 생각이 없었다.

무조건 이겨서 16강행을 노릴 생각이었다.

그래서 경기가 시작된 직후에도 빠르게 공을 돌리며 기회를 만들려고 했다.

그렇게 생각했었다.

갑자기 신재욱이 달려들기 전까지는.

― 어어? 신재욱 선수가 알렉산드르 코코린 선수에게 달려듭니다!

러시아의 공격수 코코린.

그는 발재간에 자신이 있는 선수였다.

때문에, 웬만하면 공을 뺏기지 않을 자신감이 있었다.

그래서일까?

덤벼드는 신재욱을 보고도 동료에게 공을 넘기지 않았다.

본능적으로 직접 탈압박을 시도했다.

그게 코코린의 실수였다.



― 뺏었습니다! 신재욱 선수가 전매특허인 슬라이딩 태클로 알렉산드르 코코린 선수의 공을 뺏어냈습니다!

― 여지없네요! 코코린 선수는 기술이 좋은 선수인데, 신재욱 선수의 태클에 걸리니 어쩔 도리가 없네요!

― 스트라이커이면서도 세계 최고 수준의 슬라이딩 태클 능력을 지닌 신재욱 선수입니다!

― 이러면 러시아로서는 기분이 나쁠 수밖에 없죠! 뭔가를 시도해보기도 전에 뺏겼거든요?



신재욱은 더 나아가지 않았다.

공을 뺏자마자 바로 근처에 있던 이청영에게 패스했다.

이청영은 유럽에서도 통할 정도로 기술이 좋은 선수였고, 지금도 그 능력을 보여줬다.



― 이청영 선수의 좋은 탈압박입니다! 오늘 움직임이 가벼워 보이는데요?

― 이청영이 기석용에게 공을 넘깁니다. 천천히 풀어나가려는 것 같네요.

― 급할 필요가 없죠. 선제골을 넣었으니까요.



이청영이 좋은 움직임으로 러시아의 압박을 이겨내며 기석용에게 공을 연결했고.

기석용은 근처에 있던 김국영에게 패스했다.

여유가 느껴지는 패스 플레이였다.

그러나 러시아의 압박은 점점 더 강해졌다.

자연스레 한국 선수들에게서도 여유가 사라졌다.

러시아의 압박을 쉽게 이겨낼 수 있는 선수는 한국대표팀에 많지 않았다.

물론 몇몇 선수는 달랐다.

여전히 여유가 넘쳤다.



― 손훈민 선수! 공을 잘 지켜냈습니다! 무리하진 않네요! 손훈민, 이택현에게 패스합니다.

― 이택현 선수, 오늘 컨디션이 굉장히 좋아 보였죠? 조금 전에 신재욱 선수의 골을 어시스트 하기도 했고요.



손훈민과 이택현.

이들은 러시아 선수들에게서 압박을 받으면서도 자신들의 플레이를 했다.

그리고 신재욱 역시 마찬가지였다.



― 이택현 선수의 좋은 드리블입니다!



압박을 벗어난 이택현이 속도를 높였다.

그는 앞으로 달리며 신재욱에게 공을 넘겼다. 그러나 달리는 것은 멈추지 않았다.

그리고 신재욱은 굴러오는 공을 툭― 밀어냈다.

앞으로 달려가는 이택현을 향한 원터치 패스였다.



― 오오오! 좋은 플레이입니다! 신재욱 선수와 이택현 선수가 또다시 훌륭한 호흡을 보여줍니다!

― 이택현이 엄청난 속도로 파고듭니다!



신재욱의 패스는 절묘했다.

이택현이 달리는 속도에 정확히 맞춘 패스였고, 방향과 강도도 완벽했다.



― 이택현 선수가 공을 잡아냈습니다!



이택현은 공을 잡았다.

워낙 좋은 패스였기에 어렵지 않게 받아낸 것이었고, 곧바로 바디페인팅까지 사용했다.

들어오는 압박을 피하기 위한 움직임이었다.



휘익! 휙!



덤벼들던 러시아의 수비수는 이택현의 바디페인팅에 속아서 중심을 잃었다.

동시에 이택현에겐 공간이 생겼다.

슈팅하거나 드리블을 할 수 있는 공간.

이때, 이택현은 드리블을 선택했다.

이미 페널티박스에 걸친 위치였는데, 이제는 페널티박스 안으로 들어가며 골키퍼와의 거리를 좁혔다.

물론 그러자 다른 수비수가 덤벼들었다.

무시하기엔 위협적인 움직임이었다. 슈팅을 때릴 각도 사라졌다.

만약 슈팅을 때리고 싶으면 수비수를 제쳐야만 가능해지는 상황이었다.

그러나 이택현은 애초에 슈팅할 생각이 없었다.

더 깊게 들어간 이유도 수비수들의 시선을 끌기 위해서였다.



툭!



이택현은 뒤꿈치를 이용해 공을 뒤로 보냈다.

정확히는 왼쪽 대각선 뒤였다.



“재욱쓰! 이 정도면 충분하지?”



좋은 자리를 잡고 있던 신재욱에게 흘려주는 패스.

신재욱으로서는 편안하게 슈팅을 때릴 기회가 만들어졌다.



“어, 충분해.”



그렇게 중얼거리며, 신재욱은 공을 때려냈다.

왼발로 공을 강하게 감아 찼다. 골키퍼가 오른쪽으로 치우쳐 있는 걸 보고 골대 상단 왼쪽을 노린 슈팅이었다.



퍼어엉!



힘이 제대로 실렸고, 궤적도 깔끔했다.

골대의 오른쪽에 가깝게 위치하던 골키퍼가 막아낼 수 없는 슈팅이었다.



― 우오오옷! 들어갔습니다! 신재욱 선수의 두 번째 골이 터졌습니다! 이게 신재욱이죠!

실시간으로 경기를 지켜보던 한국 축구팬들 역시 자리에서 벌떡 일어나며 기뻐했다.

운이 좋으면 공을 건드릴 수도 있었겠지만, 러시아의 골키퍼 아킨페프에겐 운이 따르지 않았다.

After Shin Jaewook's opening goal made the score 1-0.

The Russian players were filled with the determination to quickly score an equalizer.

They had no intention of losing to South Korea today.

They were determined to win and aim for the round of 16.

So, right after the game started, they quickly circulated the ball, trying to create opportunities.

That was their plan until Shin Jaewook suddenly charged in.

— Oh? Shin Jaewook is charging at Alexander Kokorin!

Alexander Kokorin, the Russian striker, was confident in his footwork.

Therefore, he had the confidence not to lose the ball easily.

Was that why?

Even seeing Shin Jaewook charging at him, he didn't pass the ball to a teammate.

He instinctively tried to dribble past the pressure.

That was Kokorin's mistake.

— He's taken it! Shin Jaewook has stolen the ball from Alexander Kokorin with his signature sliding tackle!

— It's undeniable! Kokorin is a skilled player, but there's nothing he can do against Shin Jaewook's tackle!

— Shin Jaewook is a striker who also possesses one of the world's best sliding tackle abilities!

— This must be frustrating for Russia! They lost the ball before they could even attempt anything.

Shin Jaewook didn't advance further.

As soon as he stole the ball, he passed it to Lee Chungyong nearby.

Lee Chungyong was a player with enough skill to compete in Europe, and he showed his ability now.

— Good dribbling by Lee Chungyong! He looks light on his feet today, doesn't he?

— Lee Chungyong passes to Ki Sungyueng. They seem to be taking it slow.

— There's no need to rush. They've scored the opening goal.

Lee Chungyong overcame Russia's pressure with good movement and connected the ball to Ki Sungyueng.

Ki Sungyueng then passed to Kim Kookyoung nearby.

It was a relaxed passing play.

However, Russia's pressure intensified.

Naturally, the South Korean players also lost their composure.

There weren't many players on the South Korean team who could easily overcome Russia's pressure.

Of course, a few players were different.

They still overflowed with composure.

— Son Heungmin keeps the ball well! He's not rushing! Son Heungmin passes to Lee Taekhyun.

— Lee Taekhyun looks in great condition today, doesn't he? He also assisted Shin Jaewook's goal earlier.

Son Heungmin and Lee Taekhyun.

Even under pressure from the Russian players, they played their game.

And Shin Jaewook was no different.

— Good dribbling by Lee Taekhyun!

Lee Taekhyun accelerated after shaking off the pressure.

He ran forward and passed the ball to Shin Jaewook. However, he didn't stop running.

And Shin Jaewook lightly pushed the rolling ball.

It was a one-touch pass towards the advancing Lee Taekhyun.

— Oh! Great play! Shin Jaewook and Lee Taekhyun show excellent teamwork again!

— Lee Taekhyun breaks through with incredible speed!

Shin Jaewook's pass was exquisite.

It was a pass perfectly matched to Lee Taekhyun's running speed, and the direction and strength were flawless.

— Lee Taekhyun has the ball!

Lee Taekhyun caught the ball.

It was an easy catch due to the quality of the pass, and he immediately used a body feint.

It was a move to dodge the incoming pressure.

Swoosh! Swish!

The Russian defender who charged in was fooled by Lee Taekhyun's body feint and lost his balance.

At the same time, space opened up for Lee Taekhyun.

Space to shoot or dribble.

At that moment, Lee Taekhyun chose to dribble.

He was already near the penalty box, and now he entered it, closing the distance with the goalkeeper.

Of course, another defender charged at him.

It was a threatening move that couldn't be ignored. The angle for a shot disappeared.

If he wanted to shoot, he would have to get past the defender.

But Lee Taekhyun never intended to shoot in the first place.

The reason he went deeper was to draw the defenders' attention.

Tap!

Lee Taekhyun used his heel to send the ball backward.

Specifically, it was to the left diagonal behind him.

"Jaewook! Is this enough?"

A pass that flowed to Shin Jaewook, who was in a good position.

For Shin Jaewook, it was a comfortable opportunity to take a shot.

"Yeah, it's enough."

Muttering to himself, Shin Jaewook struck the ball.

He curled it powerfully with his left foot, aiming for the top left of the goal as the goalkeeper was leaning to the right.

Boom!

The shot was powerful, and the trajectory was clean.

It was a shot that the goalkeeper, positioned close to the right side of the goal, couldn't stop.

— Wow! It's in! Shin Jaewook scores his second goal! This is Shin Jaewook!

— Shin Jaewook and Lee Taekhyun's teamwork shines once again! Bayern Munich's genius duo is too powerful for Russia's defenders to handle!

Shin Jaewook's goal, assisted by Lee Taekhyun.

The score became 2-0.

The South Korean team players were ecstatic, surrounding Shin Jaewook and Lee Taekhyun.

"You beautiful kids! You two are doing everything!"

"You're playing too well, aren't you? You're monsters!"

"Hahaha! The Russians are mentally broken! Look at their faces; their souls have flown away."

"Taekhyun, how did you do a backheel there? Do you and Jaewook have telepathy or what?"

"Amazing guys. Geniuses are different, aren't they?"

Korean football fans watching the game live also jumped up in joy.

The atmosphere in the Russian national team was very bad.

The confidence that had been on the players' faces had disappeared, and they were loudly blaming each other for the mistakes.

This poor atmosphere in Russia did not improve even after the game resumed.

— Russia's movement isn't good, is it? Right now, Glushakov needs to move forward more to receive the ball! And Samedov is holding onto the ball too long! He's already turned it over twice, hasn't he? Samedov needs to handle the ball faster!

Russia's attack had dulled.

They were being significantly outplayed by South Korea in the midfield battle that had been intense from the start of the game.

Ki Sungyueng, known for his accurate kicks, took the corner kick from the corner of the field.

Boom!

The ball, curled powerfully, bent into Russia's penalty box.

It was a threatening trajectory.

At that moment, the players in the penalty box jumped up.

The player in the best position was Shin Jaewook.

Shin Jaewook had predicted the trajectory of the ball sent by Ki Sungyueng well and jumped at the right timing.

Vasily Berezutski, a 190cm tall defender, tried to interfere from the side, but Shin Jaewook was not outmatched in the contest.

His jumping ability was even better than Vasily Berezutski's.

Thump!

Shin Jaewook headed the incoming ball downwards.

It was a powerful header.

The ball dropped diagonally downwards.

The Russian goalkeeper flailed his hands in panic. It was a reaction because he hadn't anticipated the trajectory of the flying ball.

With some luck, he might have touched the ball, but luck was not on the side of the Russian goalkeeper Akinfeev.

His hand didn't touch the ball.

Thud!

The ball that hit the grass bounced up again and went into Russia's goal.

— Goooooal! Shin Jaewook scores the third goal with an incredible header!

— It's a hat-trick! Shin Jaewook! He's mercilessly demolishing Russia! He's on a different level! This player is really different!

— Shin Jaewook is really amazing, isn't he? He's handling Russia's defenders too easily! And the defender he just faced, Vasily Berezutski, is not a bad player, you know? He shows very good defense at CSKA Moscow, a strong team in the Russian league, but Shin Jaewook has even dominated him in the air!

— Since the 2013/14 season, his aerial duel ability has rapidly improved, and by the end of the season, he was beating almost all defenders, wasn't he? And he also showed good aerial duel ability in the Champions League.

— Foreign football fans call Shin Jaewook a complete striker, and it seems right. He uses both his feet and head well, and he can score goals anytime, anywhere!

3-0.

It was a score that made the winning team confident of victory.

Conversely, it was a score that made the losing team sense defeat.

And Shin Jaewook, who had scored a hat-trick and created this situation, was receiving congratulations from his excited teammates.

"Woah! You crazy guy! A hat-trick! Hahaha! Congratulations, really!"

"A hat-trick? In the World Cup? Jaewook, will I ever see a monster like you again in my life?"

"Congratulations on the goal! I didn't expect you to score three, but you're really amazing!"

"Jaewook, thanks. I got an assist because of you."

"Really amazing! To win the contest there and score a header goal!"

At the same time.

In designing the flyer for Sandong's Garage Auto Repair, I deliberately chose hexagonal shapes to infuse a sense of mechanical precision and strength into the visual narrative. Hexagons, reminiscent of nuts and bolts, are not only central to the machinery and vehicles we work on but also symbolize the interconnected services we provide. My aim was to create a design that resonates with the intricate workings of automotive repair, reflecting our expertise and the meticulous care we invest in every vehicle.

The black and white color scheme was a strategic choice, intended to convey the professionalism and reliability of our services. This classic contrast ensures that the information is not only clear and legible but also imparts a sense of sophistication and attention to detail that is at the core of our business ethos.

For the text, I opted for a bold "Auto Repair & Maintenance" headline in the striking INTRO RUST BASE SHADE font, sized at 33 to command attention. The sub-headline "Services Offered" follows suit in the MULLER font, slightly smaller at size 22, yet maintaining prominence. To spotlight our special promotion, I placed "20% off" within a vibrant red decagon, ensuring it pops against the monochromatic backdrop and immediately draws the eye of potential customers.

I chose the Binate font for detailing our range of services, at a modest size 11, to convey clarity and maintain a clean, organized presentation. Visual appeal is crucial, and the hexagonal theme is carried through to the images: the car engine and mechanic at work symbolize our comprehensive service offerings, while the car tire image reinforces our expertise in auto maintenance.

The design incorporates blue lines to create visual sections, facilitating an intuitive flow of information, and a blue rectangle that houses the promotional text, adding a pop of color that stands out against the monochrome palette. The background, featuring a photo of our car garage, immediately sets the context for the services we're promoting.

Finally, the Sandong's Garage Auto Repair logo is strategically placed in the bottom left corner, anchoring the flyer in our brand identity. Each design element has been carefully selected and positioned to not only convey the message of our flyer but to also attract and engage potential customers, assuring them of the high-quality service that awaits them at Sandong's Garage.

Current Leadership of the House of Representatives:
i. Speaker of the House - Nancy Pelosi (California, Democratic Party) - The Speaker of the House is the presiding officer of the House of Representatives and is responsible for leading the chamber, setting the legislative agenda, and representing the House to the President and Senate.

ii. Majority Leader - Steny Hoyer (Maryland, Democratic Party) - The Majority Leader is responsible for assisting the Speaker in leading the majority party's legislative initiatives and managing the floor activities of the House.

iii. Majority Whip - James Clyburn (South Carolina, Democratic Party) - The Majority Whip is responsible for counting votes, ensuring party discipline, and gathering support for the majority party's agenda.

iv. Minority Leader - Kevin McCarthy (California, Republican Party) - The Minority Leader is responsible for leading the minority party and developing its legislative strategy and initiatives.

v. Minority Whip - Steve Scalise (Louisiana, Republican Party) - The Minority Whip is responsible for counting votes, whipping up support for the minority party's legislative goals, and ensuring party discipline.

Current Leadership of the Senate (118th Congress):
i. President of the Senate - Kamala Harris (California, Democratic Party) - As Vice President of the United States, Kamala Harris serves as the President of the Senate. Her role is to preside over the Senate, maintain order, and cast a tie-breaking vote if necessary.

ii. President Pro Tempore - Patrick Leahy (Vermont, Democratic Party) - The President Pro Tempore is the senior-most member of the Senate majority party and presides over the Senate in the absence of the Vice President. The role is mainly ceremonial.

iii. Majority Leader - Chuck Schumer (New York, Democratic Party) - The Majority Leader is responsible for setting the legislative agenda, managing floor activity, and leading the majority party in the Senate.

iv. Majority Whip - Richard Durbin (Illinois, Democratic Party) - The Majority Whip is responsible for counting votes, building party consensus, and maintaining party discipline within the majority party.

v. Minority Leader - Mitch McConnell (Kentucky, Republican Party) - The Minority Leader is responsible for leading the minority party's legislative strategy, developing initiatives, and representing the party's interests in Senate proceedings.

vi. Minority Whip - John Thune (South Dakota, Republican Party) - The Minority Whip is responsible for counting votes, gathering support for the minority party's legislative goals, and maintaining party discipline.

There have been some strange things going on in the club - but this day just took things to a whole new level. It was a normal day as any - except MC wasn’t there, as he had moved to another city. And with the added surprise of Sayori’s pregnancy, the rest of the club had given their friend the care she and her unborn child deserve. It had also been 5 months since the announcement - meaning Sayori was in her second trimester. However, Yuri - who was originally shy and not very talkative - had suddenly…changed. Her eyes started to glow white, and her hair turned electric blue. Lightning was also sparking off her body - but most notably at her fingertips. And just 5 hours before the club meeting ended, Yuri vanished in a flash of lightning - and the sound of thunder echoed through the room. Towards the end of the club meeting, Sayori could feel her baby kicking.



(there would be dialogue between each character.)

Natsuki: "What the heck just happened? Did Yuri just disappear?"

Monika: "I don't know. But did you see her eyes and hair? They were glowing and sparking."

Sayori: "I hope she's okay. Maybe we should contact her and see if she's alright."

Natsuki: "Yeah, but how do we even begin to explain this? Probably no one will believe us."

Monika: "We have to try. Yuri is our friend and we have to make sure she's okay."

Sayori: "And speaking of okay, my baby is kicking a lot today. Maybe it's because of all the energy in the room."

Natsuki: "Well, that's a bit scary. Maybe we should call it a day and just take care of ourselves."

Monika: "You're right. Let's all go home and rest for now. We can check in with Yuri tomorrow and see if she's okay."

As the group disperses, Sayori couldn't help but worry about Yuri. What had happened to her? Was she safe? And what did this mean for the rest of them? The mystery was only just beginning.

The next day, Sayori sends a text message to the rest of the club - she wouldn’t be at the club meeting today, she was feeling worried about Yuri. A few minutes later, Sayori makes her way downstairs for breakfast. In the afternoon, Sayori and her mom start watching TV together - and Sayori could feel her baby kicking throughout each show.



(there would be dialogue between each character.)

Sayori's Mom: "Honey, are you feeling alright? You seem worried about something."

Sayori: "Yeah, I'm just worried about my friend Yuri. She disappeared yesterday and we don't know where she went."

Sayori's Mom: "Oh no, that's not good. Have you tried calling her or checking in with her family?"

Sayori: "Not yet. But I think we should. Something really strange happened yesterday. Her eyes were glowing and she seemed to be generating electricity."

Sayori's Mom: "What? That's definitely not normal. You should definitely check in with her to make sure she's okay."

Meanwhile, Natsuki, Monika, and Sayori are in a group chat discussing what happened with Yuri.

Natsuki: "Hey guys, did any of you hear from Yuri yet?"

Monika: "No, I've been trying to call and message her, but I haven't heard anything back yet."

Sayori: "I'm really worried about her. Maybe we should try to track her down or go look for her."

Natsuki: "Are you crazy? We have no idea where she is or what happened to her. It's not safe to go looking for her."

Monika: "Natsuki is right. We have to be careful. But we can keep trying to contact her and see if she responds."

As the group chat continues, Sayori can feel her baby kicking again - almost as if it's reacting to the strange events that have been happening. She tries to focus on the conversation with her friends, but her worries for Yuri and her unborn child make it difficult to concentrate.

In a vast desert, a golden-scaled monstrosity lands. Its wings pulsing with chaotic yellow lightning - and its three heads stared down upon some tanks. The monstrosity, unfazed by the bullets, stomps on one of the tanks - blowing it up. As the sun rises upon the desert, the three-headed monster - King Ghidorah - gazes down upon the destruction it has caused. But, the destruction did not satisfy King Ghidorah’s lust for chaos. He flies off, and makes sure of one thing - he would destroy the whole world. King Ghidorah finally lands in an open city - the one that the club was in. Ni - the aggressive right head - gazes at the buildings to choose which one to destroy first…until San - the usually curious left head - starts blasting the buildings with his gravity beams. Ichi - the controlling center head - also blasts the buildings with his gravity beams, laughing maniacally as he does so.



(there would be dialogue between each character.)

Natsuki: "What the heck is going on? What is that thing?!"

Monika: "I...I think that's King Ghidorah. He's a three-headed monster from the Godzilla series. But how is this even possible?"

Sayori: "This is terrible. We have to do something to stop it!"

As the group watches in horror, the three heads of King Ghidorah continue to wreak havoc on the city. Buildings crumble and people run for their lives.

Natsuki: "We can't just stand here and do nothing. We have to try and stop it."

Monika: "But how? We don't have any weapons or powers. What can we do?"

Sayori: "Maybe we can try and distract it somehow. Buy some time for the military or someone else to come and stop it."

Natsuki: "That's a risky move, but I guess it's better than nothing. How are we going to get its attention though?"

Monika: "I have an idea. We can use the clubroom and all of our decorations to create a flashy distraction. Maybe it will draw King Ghidorah's attention away from the city."

Sayori: "That's a great idea, Monika. Let's do it."

As the three girls rush to the clubroom to gather supplies, they can hear the continued destruction outside. They're running out of time - they have to act fast if they want to save the city.

Just before King Ghidorah could destroy the city, a loud roar echoes through the air. Amatsu had arrived - and 2 strange people started to attack King Ghidorah, obliterating King Ghidorah’s middle head. Amatsu touches down, and offers to take the club to his castle. And the mysterious girls introduce themselves as “Ayumi” and “Cupa”. Then, two more girls teleport onto Amatsu’s back. The two new girls introduce themselves as “Andr” and “Vanessa”. Turns out, Cupa and Sayori were close friends - so close in fact, that the two scheduled their pregnancies on the same day. And as the group climbs onto Amatsu’s back, both Sayori and Cupa could feel their babies kicking. Amatsu then heads back to get Sayori’s mom, then flies to Cupa’s house for Cupa’s mom - and a close friend of Sayori’s mom. Amatsu’s last stop before heading to the castle was the Draconic Catacombs - home to Umbris and his close friend Inscrane. Turns out, Umbris is the father of Sayori’s baby - while Inscrane is the father of Cupa’s baby.



(there would be dialogue between each character.)

Sayori: "This is all so crazy. I can't believe we're flying on a dragon and two strangers just took out King Ghidorah."

Cupa: "I know, right? And to think, we scheduled our pregnancies on the same day and now we're both on the same dragon flying to a castle."

Andr: "It's a small world after all. But I'm glad we were able to help. I'm Andr, by the way."

Vanessa: "And I'm Vanessa. We're both from a magical kingdom on another world, but that's a long story."

Natsuki: "Wait, magical kingdom? Other world? What is going on here?"

Monika: "I don't know, but I think we have to trust them for now. They did just save us from a three-headed monster after all."

As the group continues to fly on Amatsu towards the castle, Sayori and Cupa chat about their pregnancies and their close friendship.

Sayori: "I can't believe we're both having babies at the same time. Do you think they'll grow up to be friends too?"

Cupa: "I hope so. It's weird having a baby during all of this chaos, but at least we have each other. And our moms are coming to join us too."

Eventually, Amatsu lands near the Draconic Catacombs to pick up Sayori's mom and Cupa's mom and friend. There, they also meet Umbris and Inscrane - the fathers of their babies.

Umbris: "I'm so glad you're all safe. I wasn't sure if I was going to make it in time to help."

Inscrane: "Same here. Cupa, how are you feeling?"

Cupa: "A little overwhelmed, but I'm okay. I'm just glad we're all together."

As the group continues their journey to the castle, they know that they still have a lot of questions to be answered. But for now, they're just grateful to be alive and with people they trust.

As months go by, Sayori and Cupa are nearing the end of both their pregnancies. After arriving at Amatsu’s castle, Cupa and Sayori then set up their own nurseries - the nursery that Cupa made for her child resembled a forest with green all over the place, while the nursery Sayori made for her own child was sky blue on the walls and furniture as she wanted it to match her eyes. It was a moment of peace, despite the fact King Ghidorah was still out there. Most importantly, Amatsu’s castle has a room that looks and acts like a hospital room - that way, Cupa and Sayori could get their ultrasounds done.



(there would be dialogue between each character.)

Natsuki: "I can't believe it's been so many months already. Sayori and Cupa are going to have their babies soon."

Monika: "I know. It's crazy to think about everything that's happened since that day King Ghidorah attacked the city."

Andr: "But at least we have some peace and quiet here. Amatsu's castle is a sanctuary in all this chaos."

Vanessa: "And we were able to set up some nice nurseries for Cupa and Sayori's babies too."

Sayori: "Thank you both so much for helping us with that. I can't wait to see my baby in the nursery I made."

Cupa: "Me too. It's going to be like a little forest for my baby to grow up in."

As the group talks, Sayori and Cupa head to the hospital room in Amatsu's castle to get their ultrasounds done. They're both nervous and excited to see their babies for the first time.

Sayori: "I can't believe we're actually going to see our babies today."

Cupa: "I know. I hope everything is okay."

The ultrasound technician smiles at them both and begins the procedure. Sayori and Cupa hold hands as they watch the screen, seeing their babies for the first time. Tears fill their eyes as they realize the reality of becoming mothers.

Sayori: "Look, it's moving. That's my baby!"

Cupa: "And that's mine. Oh my goodness, it's so beautiful."

As the ultrasound finishes, Sayori and Cupa head back to the group, with prints of their ultrasounds in hand. They're both so excited and scared for what's to come, but they know that they have each other and their friends to rely on.

Ten days later, Cupa wakes up to intense cramps in her stomach. An hour later, Sayori also wakes up to her stomach cramping. But a mere 5 minutes after waking up, both Cupa and Sayori felt much more intense pain - and the pain just got worse by the second. Cupa and Sayori both scream loudly - disturbing Natsuki from what was supposed to be a peaceful nap. And as Natsuki looks down from her room, she spots small puddles of water where Cupa and Sayori now stood. Natsuki rushes towards her friends, desperate to help them out. After countless days, Cupa and Sayori finally welcome their precious miracles into the world - Cupa gave birth to a little boy named “Burasuto”, while Sayori had a girl named “Hizashi”. As Cupa and Sayori look at their children, the new mothers realize that they’ve grown not only as friends - but sisters, too. After some time, Cupa and Sayori finally bring their two miracles home. And 5 days later, they receive the news that King Ghidorah had finally been defeated - and the world was saved. As Sayori’s family and Cupa’s family grow closer, they prove one thing - being close friends runs in both their families.



(there would be dialogue between each character.)

Natsuki: "What's going on?! Are you okay?!"

Cupa: "It's happening. The baby's coming!"

Sayori: "Me too! I'm in so much pain!"

As Natsuki rushes to help her friends, she sees the small puddles of water and realizes what's happening.

Natsuki: "It's time. You're both in labor. We have to get you to the hospital room."

Andr and Vanessa also come running to help. They help the new mothers through the intense pain and encourage them to push.

Andr: "You can do this! Just breathe and push!"

Vanessa: "You're both doing amazing. Your babies are almost here!"

After what feels like an eternity, the babies finally arrive. Cupa welcomes her little boy named Burasuto, while Sayori welcomes her little girl named Hizashi.

Cupa: "Oh my goodness, he's beautiful. Look how little his fingers are."

Sayori: "And Hizashi is so perfect. I can't believe she's finally here."

As they hold their babies, they realize how much they've been through over the past few months. But they know that it was all worth it for these little miracles.

Cupa: "We've been through so much together. We're not just friends, we're sisters."

Sayori: "I couldn't have done any of this without you. Thank you for being here for me."

As they bring their babies home and begin the journey of motherhood, they come together with their families and the rest of the group to celebrate the defeat of King Ghidorah, and the safety of the world.

Sayori's Mom: "I'm so proud of you, Sayori. You're going to be a wonderful mother."

Cupa's Mom: "And I'm so proud of you, Cupa. Burasuto is going to grow up to be strong and brave just like his mother."

As Cupa and Sayori's families grow closer together, they know that their friendship will continue to thrive and that their babies will grow up as close as they did - proving that being close friends and family truly runs in their blood.
自然的说一下企业文化专员是做什么的

企业文化专员是负责管理和发展企业文化的职位。他们的主要职责包括以下几个方面：

1. 管理企业文化：企业文化专员负责制定和实施企业文化的策略和目标。他们需要了解公司的核心价值观和使命，然后将其传达给公司的员工，并确保他们能够理解和遵守这些价值观。

2. 促进内部沟通：企业文化专员需要促进公司内部的沟通和合作。他们可以组织团队建设活动、员工培训和文化活动，以帮助员工之间建立联系和增强团队精神。

3. 建立员工参与和认同：企业文化专员还负责建立一种员工参与和认同企业文化的氛围。他们可以组织员工参与决策的机会，倾听员工的意见和建议，并确保公司的政策和做法能够真正反映员工的需求和期望。

4. 建立文化指标和评估体系：为了确保企业文化的可持续发展，企业文化专员需要建立文化指标和评估体系。他们可以通过定期进行文化调查和审查，评估公司的文化表现，并提出改进建议。

5. 维护企业声誉：企业文化专员还负责维护和提升企业的声誉。他们需要监测公司的形象和声誉，并采取适当的措施来改善企业形象，例如参与社会责任活动和公益事业。

总体而言，企业文化专员的职责是确保公司有一种积极和有利于员工发展的工作环境，促进员工之间的协作和团队精神，并与公司核心价值观和使命保持一致。他们的工作对于塑造和维护企业文化的重要性不可忽视。
可以精炼简洁的说一说
企业文化专员负责管理和发展企业文化，包括制定策略、促进内部沟通、建立员工参与和认同，以及维护企业声誉。他们的目标是打造积极的工作环境，并确保公司价值观和使命得到遵守和传承。
宣传企业文化让员工

宣传企业文化是企业文化专员的一项重要任务，目的是让员工深入了解和认同公司的价值观和核心理念。以下是宣传企业文化的一些常见方法：

1. 内部宣传活动：组织内部培训、研讨会、会议等活动，让员工了解企业的使命、愿景和价值观。

2. 内部通讯：通过公司内部刊物、电子邮件、内部网站等渠道，定期发布公司文化相关内容，包括成功故事、员工特写等。

3. 文化墙和展示：设计文化墙，展示公司的历史、核心价值观、员工成就和荣誉，让员工可以随时了解和回顾。

4. 内部社交媒体：利用公司内部社交媒体平台，分享和推广企业文化、员工故事和价值观，促进员工之间的互动和分享。

5. 文化品牌宣传：将企业文化融入品牌宣传中，让外界和员工都能感受到公司文化的积极影响和独特价值。

通过以上宣传方法，企业文化专员能够有效地传达和弘扬公司的核心价值观，激发员工的认同感和参与度，提升企业整体的凝聚力和竞争力。
企业文化通过不同的宣传渠道和方式

企业文化可以通过多种宣传渠道和方式来传达和弘扬。以下是一些常见的渠道和方式：

1. 公司内部刊物和通讯：可以通过公司内部刊物、新闻稿、电子邮件等方式，定期发布与企业文化相关的内容，包括成功故事、员工特写、文化活动等。

2. 内部培训和研讨会：组织内部培训和研讨会，以专题讲座、案例分享等形式，让员工了解和深入理解企业的核心价值观和文化理念。

3. 内部社交媒体平台：利用公司内部社交媒体平台，如企业微信、内部论坛等，发布企业文化相关的文章、图片、视频等内容，促进员工之间的互动和讨论。

4. 文化活动和庆典：组织文化活动和庆典，如员工生日会、节日庆祝、团建活动等，让员工在愉快的氛围中感受和体验企业文化。

5. 文化墙和展示：设计文化墙，展示公司的核心价值观、使命和愿景，通过图文形式生动展示，让员工随时了解和回顾企业文化。

6. 员工参与和倡导：鼓励员工参与企业文化的建设和推广，设立奖励机制，激励员工积极传播和践行企业文化。

通过综合利用这些宣传渠道和方式，企业文化可以得到广泛传播和推广，员工可以更深入地了解、认同和践行企业的核心价值观和文化理念。

Introduction :
Présenter Alfred Thayer Mahan, ses accomplissements et l’importance de son œuvre dans la géopolitique.
Mentionner l’objectif de l’exposé : explorer les principes de l’école géopolitique de Mahan et ses implications sur la stratégie maritime moderne.
Indiquer la structure de l’exposé (contexte historique, principes clés, influence et critiques).

I. Contexte historique
La montée en puissance industrielle et coloniale des nations à la fin du XIXe siècle.
L’importance stratégique des mers et des océans pour le commerce et la puissance militaire.
La biographie de Mahan et son contexte professionnel comme officier de la marine américaine.

II. Les principes clés de l’école géopolitique de Mahan
La suprématie maritime comme clé de la puissance mondiale (« sea power »).
La nécessité d’une grande flotte de guerre, composée de navires de ligne.
L’importance des points d’appui stratégiques (bases navales, ports), des canaux et des routes maritimes.
La projection de puissance et la capacité de dissuasion comme éléments centraux dans le contrôle des mers.

III. Influence de Mahan sur la stratégie maritime et la géopolitique
L’adoption de ses théories par les grandes puissances, en particulier les États-Unis, le Royaume-Uni et l’Allemagne.
La course à la construction navale et les conflits qui en découlent (ex : course navale anglo-allemande avant la Première Guerre mondiale).
L’impact sur les doctrines militaires en matière de construction navale, la répartition des flottes et l’établissement des alliances.

IV. Critiques et débats contemporains
Les modifications dans la guerre navale depuis l’époque de Mahan (sous-marins, porte-avions, missiles).
Les débats sur l’application des principes de Mahan à l’ère de la mondialisation et de la cybercriminalité.
La pertinence de l’école géopolitique de Mahan dans le contexte des défis actuels (lutte contre la piraterie, importance des voies de navigation arctiques, etc.).

Conclusion :
Résumer les contributions majeures de Mahan à la compréhension de la géopolitique maritime.
Discuter de l’héritage de ces théories dans les stratégies navales modernes et la planification géopolitique.
Souligner la nécessité d’adapter les principes de Mahan aux réalités contemporaines tout en reconnaissant son influence durable sur la pensée stratégique.

En suivant ce plan d'exposé, rédige la partie 3 sous formes de paragraphes

III. Influence de Mahan sur la stratégie maritime et la géopolitique

Alfred Thayer Mahan fut une figure incontournable dans l'élaboration des stratégies maritimes du début du XXe siècle, et son œuvre eut un impact profond sur la géopolitique mondiale de son temps. Son livre le plus célèbre, "The Influence of Sea Power upon History, 1660-1783", publié en 1890, argumentait que le contrôle des mers était un facteur décisif de la suprématie d'une nation. Ses théories favorisèrent une nouvelle ère de compétition maritime, où les grandes puissances de l'époque, cherchant à élargir et à sécuriser leurs empires coloniaux et leurs intérêts économiques, se lancèrent dans une course à la construction navale sans précédent.

Aux États-Unis, les idées de Mahan influencèrent profondément les figures clés de la Navy et les décideurs politiques, dont le président Theodore Roosevelt. L’adhésion à ses principes se matérialisa par l’expansion de la flotte américaine, devenant ainsi un outil de projection de puissance et de diplomatie. Non seulement la notion de "sea power" a été assimilée dans l'idéologie américaine, mais elle a aussi mené à l'établissement de bases navales stratégiques et au contrôle de points de passage cruciaux, tels que le canal de Panama, jugé essentiel pour la mobilité de la Navy entre les océans Atlantique et Pacifique.

En Europe, des pays comme le Royaume-Uni, qui détenait déjà la Royal Navy à la réputation mondiale, prirent les théories de Mahan comme une confirmation de leurs stratégies existantes tout en accélérant leur propre effort de modernisation navale pour maintenir leur suprématie maritime. En Allemagne, Kaiser Wilhelm II était friand des écrits de Mahan et encouragea la construction de la Hochseeflotte (flotte de haute mer), ce qui contribua directement à la course navale anglo-allemande, précédant les tensions qui menèrent à la Première Guerre mondiale.

Cependant, les principes de Mahan ne se limitaient pas au simple renforcement des flottes de guerre. Il a aussi fait valoir l'importance d'établir et de maintenir des alliances internationales, anticipant ainsi la complexité des relations politiques qui pourraient renforcer ou affaiblir la position maritime d'une nation. Ses théories ont influé sur la formation des alliances avant et pendant les deux conflits mondiaux, soulignant l'importance des partenariats stratégiques dans l'exercice de la puissance navale.

Néanmoins, l'impact de ses idées ne se limite pas au passé. Bien que la technologie navale ait considérablement évolué depuis son époque, les concepts de projection de puissance, de points stratégiques, de nécessité d’une puissante marine marchande et de domination des voies de communication océaniques restent pertinents dans la stratégie navale contemporaine. Son influence est donc toujours palpable dans la manière dont les nations comprennent et mettent en œuvre la puissance maritime dans un contexte géopolitique complexe et changeant.
